info.name: Podcast API
info.description: A comprehensive RESTful API for a podcast platform built with Laravel 12. This collection includes all endpoints for managing categories, podcasts, episodes, and user authentication.

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Register a new user and receive an authentication token.

response.name: Validation Error

request.description: Log in a user and receive an authentication token.
Log out a user by revoking their authentication token.
Get the authenticated user's information.

item.description: Endpoints for user registration, login, and authentication management

query.description: Field to sort by (sort_order, name, created_at)

request.description: Get a paginated list of all categories with optional filtering.

response.name: Successful Categories List

request.description: Get a list of featured categories.

response.name: Successful Featured Categories
response.body:
{
    "success": true,

request.description: Get detailed information about a specific category by its slug.

request.description: Get a paginated list of podcasts in a specific category.

response.name: Successful Podcasts by Category
response.body:
{
    "success": true,

request.description: Update an existing category (requires authentication).

response.name: Successful Category Update
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": "Category updated successfully",
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "Updated Category Name",
        "slug": "updated-category-slug",
        "description": "Updated description",
        "image_url": "https://example.com/images/updated.jpg",
        "is_featured": false,
        "sort_order": 10,
        "created_at": "2025-04-22T12:00:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2025-04-22T12:35:00.000000Z"
    }
}

request.description: Delete a category (requires authentication).

query.description: Field to sort by (created_at, title, author_name)

request.description: Get a paginated list of all podcasts with optional filtering and sorting.

query.description: Number of featured podcasts to return

request.description: Get a list of featured podcasts for homepage display.
Get detailed information about a specific podcast.
Get a paginated list of episodes for a specific podcast.

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Tech Talks Weekly",
    "slug": "tech-talks-weekly",
    "description": "A weekly podcast covering the latest in technology news and trends.",
    "image_url": "https://example.com/images/tech-talks.jpg",
    "author_name": "Jane Smith",
    "category_id": 1,
    "is_featured": false,
    "tags": [1, 3, 5]
}

request.description: Create a new podcast (requires authentication).

body.raw:
{
    "title": "Tech Talks Weekly (Updated)",
    "slug": "tech-talks-weekly",
    "description": "An updated weekly podcast covering the latest in technology news and trends.",
    "image_url": "https://example.com/images/tech-talks-updated.jpg",
    "author_name": "Jane Smith",
    "category_id": 1,
    "is_featured": true,
    "tags": [1, 3, 7]
}

request.description: Update an existing podcast (requires authentication).
Delete a podcast (requires authentication).

query.description: Filter episodes published after this date (YYYY-MM-DD)
Filter episodes published before this date (YYYY-MM-DD)
Field to sort by (published_at, title, duration_in_seconds)

request.description: Get a paginated list of all episodes with optional filtering and sorting.

query.description: Number of featured episodes to return

request.description: Get a list of featured episodes for homepage display.

query.description: Number of recent episodes to return

request.description: Get a list of recently published episodes.
Get detailed information about a specific episode.

body.raw:
{
    "podcast_id": 1,
    "title": "The Future of AI Development",
    "slug": "the-future-of-ai-development",
    "description": "In this episode, we discuss the future of AI development and its impact on society.",
    "audio_url": "https://example.com/episodes/future-ai.mp3",
    "duration_in_seconds": 3600,
    "transcript": "Complete transcript of the episode...",
    "is_featured": false,
    "published_at": "2025-04-20T12:00:00Z"
}

request.description: Create a new episode for a podcast (requires authentication).

body.raw:
{
    "podcast_id": 1,
    "title": "The Future of AI Development (Updated)",
    "slug": "the-future-of-ai-development",
    "description": "Updated episode where we discuss the future of AI development and its impact on society.",
    "audio_url": "https://example.com/episodes/future-ai-updated.mp3",
    "duration_in_seconds": 3720,
    "transcript": "Updated transcript of the episode...",
    "is_featured": true,
    "published_at": "2025-04-20T12:00:00Z"
}

request.description: Update an existing episode (requires authentication).
Delete an episode (requires authentication).
